data.lyric:
[ti:Life's A Mess (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Halsey]
[al:Life's A Mess (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Life's A Mess (Explicit) - Juice WRLD/Halsey
[00:00.62]Lyrics by：Rex Kudo/Ashley Frangipane/Jarad Higgins/Ryan Vojesak
[00:01.25]Composed by：Rex Kudo/Ashley Frangipane/Jarad Higgins/Ryan Vojesak
[00:01.88]Juice WRLD：
[00:03.24]Have you ever fallen head over heels for somebody
[00:08.76]Not just somebody
[00:11.10]No no
[00:12.60]But she did again
[00:13.39]Have you ever fallen head over heels for somebody
[00:16.52]That made promises that give you the world
[00:19.00]Um
[00:19.53]I really hope they held you down
[00:21.27]I really hope it was no lying 'cause when heart breaks
[00:24.50]It feel like the world's gone
[00:26.61]But if the love's real you'd feel your soul roar like a lion
[00:30.08]And you'd finally let bygones be bygones
[00:32.94]Don't throw in the towel I know it feels like you're the only one trying
[00:36.81]You just gotta learn to live and love on
[00:40.65]I belong with the one put on this earth for me
[00:43.98]Everybody has their someone just gotta look and see
[00:47.37]I'm screaming out "Lord help me I've been lonely"
[00:50.21]That's when you accept me
[00:52.07]Then you set me free
[00:54.51]Uh sometimes life's a mess
[00:57.90]Uh I get high when I'm upset
[01:01.50]I remember when me and love didn't click
[01:04.37]Searching for somethin' real then I found it
[01:08.00]Uh-uh sometimes life's a mess
[01:11.14]Yeah I get high when I'm upset
[01:14.67]I remember when me and love ain't click
[01:17.81]Looking for somethin' real then I found it
[01:20.55]Can't put you f**king back well it's better now
[01:24.04]Through the trials and tribulations I found my way out
[01:26.74]Feel all of the good and bad vibrations all around
[01:30.77]All around us they surround us
[01:34.44]Was a lost cause with some lost love
[01:37.76]It ain't my fault pain chose us then I found her
[01:42.74]My whole world turned upside down uh
[01:45.98]But for the better
[01:47.86]I belong with the one put on this earth for me
[01:51.01]Everybody has their someone just gotta look and see
[01:54.49]I'm screaming out "Lord help me I've been lonely"
[01:57.43]That's when you accept me
[01:58.96]Then you set me free
[02:00.90]Juice WRLD/Halsey：
[02:01.46]Uh sometimes life's a mess
[02:05.09]Uh I get high when I'm upset
[02:08.36]I remember when me and love didn't click
[02:11.61]Searching for somethin' real then I found it
[02:15.16]Uh-uh sometimes life's a mess
[02:18.24]Yeah I get high when I'm upset
[02:21.87]I remember when me and love ain't click
[02:24.94]Looking for somethin' real then I found it
[02:28.16]Halsey：
[02:29.02]Uh uh uh uh
[02:32.20]Uh uh uh uh
[02:35.61]Uh uh uh uh
[02:38.85]Uh uh uh uh
[02:41.91]Thank God I finally found you
[02:45.02]You put the light in my eyes when I'm around you
[02:48.16]I'm too flawed to hold you down but
[02:51.76]Don't wanna be here alone
[02:54.78]And I thank God I finally found you
[02:58.47]I'll put the light in your eyes if I'm allowed to
[03:01.79]I'm too flawed to hold you down but
[03:05.18]Don't let me be here alone
data.trans:
[ti:Life's A Mess (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Halsey]
[al:Life's A Mess (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.62]//
[00:01.25]//
[00:01.88]//
[00:03.24]你是否曾为某人爱到死心塌地
[00:08.76]不只是那一个
[00:11.10]不 不
[00:12.60]Rex 你又做到了
[00:13.39]你是否曾为某人爱到死心塌地
[00:16.52]某个许诺给你全世界的人
[00:19.00]//
[00:19.53]我真心希望有人已将你征服
[00:21.27]我真心希望这一切不是谎言 因为当心支离破碎
[00:24.50]感觉世界都崩塌瓦解
[00:26.61]但如果遇上了真心的爱 你的灵魂会像狮子一样嘶吼
[00:30.08]如果你最终决定放下过往
[00:32.94]不要轻言放弃 我知道你觉得只有自己在不懈努力
[00:36.81]你只是该学会怎样继续生活 继续爱
[00:40.65]我属于那个为我来到这个世界的人
[00:43.98]每个人都有自己的命中注定 只是需要自己去寻找
[00:47.37]我放声呐喊 上帝 救救我 我被孤独缠上
[00:50.21]等你接纳我的存在
[00:52.07]我就能得到自由
[00:54.51]生活有时会一团糟
[00:57.90]失落沮丧时 却自甘堕落沉浸其中
[01:01.50]我记得那时我合不上爱的节拍
[01:04.37]一心寻觅真实的存在 终是得偿所愿
[01:08.00]生活有时会一团糟
[01:11.14]失落沮丧时 却自甘堕落沉浸其中
[01:14.67]我记得那时我合不上爱的节拍
[01:17.81]一心寻觅真实的存在 终是得偿所愿
[01:20.55]尝尽苦楚 但现在苦尽甘来
[01:24.04]翻越重重障碍 我踏上了那条康庄大道
[01:26.74]感觉所有幸福和不幸的频率
[01:30.77]将我们围绕 将我们围困其中
[01:34.44]失败的爱情使我坠入了地狱
[01:37.76]我没有犯错 是痛苦找上了我 直到遇见她
[01:42.74]使我整个世界天翻地覆
[01:45.98]为我铺开一片光明的未来
[01:47.86]我属于那个为我来到这个世界的人
[01:51.01]每个人都有自己的命中注定 只是需要自己去寻找
[01:54.49]我放声呐喊 上帝 救救我 我被孤独缠上
[01:57.43]等你接纳我的存在
[01:58.96]我就能得到自由
[02:00.90]//
[02:01.46]生活有时会一团糟
[02:05.09]失落沮丧时 却自甘堕落沉浸其中
[02:08.36]我记得那时我合不上爱的节拍
[02:11.61]一心寻觅真实的存在 终是得偿所愿
[02:15.16]生活有时会一团糟
[02:18.24]失落沮丧时 却自甘堕落沉浸其中
[02:21.87]我记得那时我合不上爱的节拍
[02:24.94]一心寻觅真实的存在 终是得偿所愿
[02:28.16]//
[02:29.02]//
[02:32.20]//
[02:35.61]//
[02:38.85]//
[02:41.91]感谢上帝 让我最后找到了你
[02:45.02]当我来到你身边 你点亮了我眼中的光
[02:48.16]我不够完美 没有资格拥有你 但是
[02:51.76]我不想孤独一人
[02:54.78]感谢上帝 让我最后找到了你
[02:58.47]如果你愿意 我会点亮你眼中的光
[03:01.79]我不够完美 没有资格拥有你 但是
[03:05.18]不要让我孤独一人
